line_1: It is the flood of human life in motion!
line_2: It is the voice of a tempestuous ocean!

line_1: Observe the Progress of the Motion.
line_2: Dick, this is not an idle Notion:

line_1: And obey'd my heart's warm motion
line_2: Oh! that in this rolling ocean

line_1: To give her once a-day a motion;
But what shall smooth that keener motion,
Contrive an Engine with perpetual Motion,
line_2: Go, cut the Caspian Lake a Road to th'Ocean;

line_1: For driving out Wind after every Motion;
line_2: In English to say, we must swallow a Potion

line_1: With many an oar in motion,
It serves to keep the heart in motion:
line_2: Of love take first a due proportion —
